channel.title: How TO HCange Xp Rates(Delta)
channel.description:
Ok I changed my max skill to 125 and i want to change xp rate... how do i do this
(lol)if some1 could tell me a good one what u think would be good?

item.title: How TO HCange Xp Rates(Delta)
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

Well I did this on different source, so I’m not sure if it will work on delta.
In client.java search for return 125
You should see something like this.

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 125; lvl++) { points += Math.floor( (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 125; }

Just change the 150 to a different number. I made mine 400 to make it harder. Again, I don’t know if it will work for delta, but you can try.

Read full topic

item.title: How TO HCange Xp Rates(Delta)
item.dc:creator: @Seerofdeath Seerofdeath
item.description:
@Seerofdeath wrote:

Serch “exprates” in client.java.

if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) { TotalExp = (double)(200*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4); } else if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(200*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(200*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(200*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); attackTimer = 7;

There is three sets that look like the. Change the numbers in TotalExp = (double)(200*hitDiff); [its highlighted] to what ever you want the xp rate to be. I like 200, not too lazy but not too hard. After that, save it, compile it, if there is no errors there you go :). Enjoy.

Read full topic
